item.description:
****OK, this month has been a "goofy" month for me schedule-wise, and somehow booked the brunch meetup AND the Dining Out meetup for the same day AND location? OOPS! But, since I have already arranged the day, I am just going to change the location.

One of the members of my Dining Out group said some Bickfords Locations offer a Brunch buffet and that it is pretty good. So, I figured, let's give it a try! Brunch is $11.95 for all you can eat and a bottomless cup of coffee? Talk about a good deal, right?

If this event fills up, please RSVP "No" with a comment requesting to be wait listed.

Everyone who has not attended previous events, please plan on bringing a dollar to help me defray the cost of posting on meetup. For everyone who has attended, I only ask that you contribute every other event. This would be such a big help to me!

I look forward to seeing you there! Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the one with red hair in my piccy! ;-)
item.why: We're great people and love to meet other great people.
item.name: Rhode Island Brunch Bunch July Meetup- BICKFORDS BUFFET- changed venue
